state_summary: Rax, a peer-to-peer clothing rental company, is expanding to the US market after launching earlier this year. The Canadian startup allows users to rent clothing items for up to six months, differentiating it from competitors that offer only daily rentals.
evidence: Alles launched Rax as a peer-to-peer clothing rental company earlier this year
Rax is one of the first of its kind to be launched in Toronto
The company has about 5,000 users on the app right now
keywords: peer-to-peer clothing rental, Rax, Canadian startup, fashion, sustainability
